sen.j: 紀 真人（き の まひと、天平19年（747年） - 延暦24年8月27日 (旧暦)（805年9月27日））は、平安時代初期の官人。
sen.e: KI no Mahito (747-September 23, 805) was a government officer (esp. one of low to medium rank) in the early Heian Period.
KI no Mahito (747 - September 23, 805) was a low to medium rank government official during the early Heian period.
sen.cmt: moved description in parenthesis to inside the sentence; changed "officer" to "official"; changed "in" to "during"; made "period" lowercase
sen.e: KI no Mahito (747 - September 27, 805) was a low to medium rank government official during the early Heian period.
sen.cmt: セル8に合わせ、没年を修正しました。

sen.e: His grandfather was Chunagon (vice-councilor of state) KI no Maro.
His grandfather was the Chunagon (vice-councilor of state) KI no Maro.
His grandfather was the Chunagon (vice-councilor of state) KI no Maro.
His father was KI no 広名.
sen.cmt: untranslated and I don't know name possibilities for "広名"
sen.e: His father was KI no Hirona.

sen.j: 延暦24年（805年）8月27日、59歳で卒去した。
sen.e: He died on September 27, 805, at the age of 59.
Mahito died at the age of 59 on September 27, 805.
sen.cmt: changed "he" to "Mahito"; fixed to read more naturally
sen.e: Mahito died at the age of 59 on September 27, 805.

sen.j: 最終官位は従四位下常陸国守だった。
sen.e: The final rank he achieved was Jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade) Hitachi no kuni no kami (the governor of Hitachi Province).
The final rank he achieved was Jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade) in the post of Hitachi no kuni no kami (the governor of Hitachi Province).
The final rank he achieved was Jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade) in the post of Hitachi no kuni no kami (the governor of Hitachi Province).

sen.j: 卒伝には「人柄温潤にしてすごぶる文藻あり」と記されている（『日本後紀』延暦24年8月27日条）。
sen.e: According to his obituary, he was 'mild-minded and was endowed with literary talent' ("Nihonkoki" (Anthology of historical events collected by Imperial command), the article of the 27th day of the eighth month of the 24th years of Enryaku (September 27, 805)).
sen.cmt: 「人柄温潤にしてすごぶる文藻あり」→定訳不明：'mild-minded and was endowed with literary talent' としました。 延暦24年8月27日条→定訳不明：the article of the 27th day of the eighth month of the 24th years of Enryaku (September 27, 805)としました。
sen.e: According to his obituary, he was 'mild-minded and endowed with literary talent' ("Nihonkoki" (Anthology of historical events collected by Imperial command, article from the twenty-seventh day of the eighth month in the twenty-fourth year of Enryaku (September 27, 805)).
sen.cmt: eliminated "was" within quotations; fixed to read more naturally
